Texts.Chs: 致密材料可以很容易地通过维亚达拉引擎重新利用，我们是否应该发现在这个时空裂缝的对面物质含量很低。我们决定明天突破这一限制，因为探索的潜力太大了，不容错过。当然，我们也带来了无敌舰队。我们不能冒险把我们的社会一分为二。
Texts.Eng: Dense materials can easily be repurposed via the Viadarra Engine, should we find ourselves low on materials on the opposite side of this unusual rift in space-time. We have decided to breach it tomorrow, as the potentiial for exploration is too great to pass up. We are, of course, bringing the Armada as well. We cannot risk splitting our society in two.

Texts.Chs: 最初的侦察队报告有利的结果。因此，我们授权全面动员，让帝国进入缺口。我们也要拿核心来冒险。我们可能需要它提供的近乎无限的能量。瑞金特坚持认为，毫无疑问地推进这一进程符合霸权的最佳利益。因此，我们服从。
Texts.Eng: Initial scouting parties report favorable results. We are therefore authorizing full mobilization, and moving the Empire into the breach. We are going to risk the Core, as well. We may require the near-limitless power it offers. The Regent insists that it is in the best interests of the Hegemony for this to proceed without question. And so, we obey.
